titleStmt.title: Citamparam, Nāṭarāja temple, time of Rājendra Cōḻa, year 24

msContents.summary: Gift of land for performing various services during festival, including adhyayana.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p: {pc} cakalapuvaṉa-c cakkaravattikaḷ śrī kō-p p(e)ruñciṅkatēvarkku yāṇṭu muppattāṟ’ āvatu siṃhanāyaṟṟu-t tiyati Oṉpatiṉāl taṉiyūr perumpaṟṟappuliyūr mulapparuṣaiyār Eḻuttu

nammur nilakkaṇakku taṉmappiriyaṉum tillaimuvāyiraveḷāṉum kaṇṭu nammur melpiṭākai (ka)ṅkaikoṇṭacōḻa-p periḷamaināṭṭu Acceri-c cāttaṅkuṭiyāṉa mayi(l)pālakulakālanallūr-p pāl śrī cuntara-cōḻava(ti)kku meṟku cōḻakulacuntaravāy-k kālukku teṟkku
2. 6-6 (symbol for kaṇṇāṟṟu) 3-catirattu Etirilicōḻaṉ tirunantavaṉattu Ellaikku meṟkkuppaṭṭa nilattu kulottuṅkacōḻaṉ tiruttōppukku maṇkoṇṭa ku(ḻi)yāy taramiliyāy mārāyar cuttappirāṉār Uḷḷuṭṭār peril mā(pp)eṟu peṟṟu nilamāy Ivarkaḷ pakkal muṉṉāḷil mutaliyār tirumañcaṇamaḻakiyār vilai koṇṭu tāmarai Oṭaiyāy Ivar puṉpayiṟ-c ceytu Aṉupavittuvarukiṟa kuḷam tukuttu mutaliyār tiruvaiyāṟuṭaiyār tillai nāyaka-c caru
3. ppetimaṅkalam Eṉṉum tirunāmattāl vaytta Akarattu brāmaṇar nāyakar tiruttēr Eḻuntaruḷum pōtu tiruppuṟakkuṭaiyilē Adhyayaṉam paṇṇi sevittum tirunāḷkaḷilum tiru(v)vasantaṉ tirunāḷilum kulottuṅkacōḻaṉ tiruttoppi(li)(l) Eḻuntaruḷiṉāl svasti śrī colli sevittum tirumañcaṉakālattu Adhyayaṉam paṇṇi sevittum Etirilicōḻaṉ tirunantavaṉattu piḷḷaiyār civapātacekaraṉ cittattuṇai-p perumāḷ Uṟsava
4. ṅkaḷukku tiruppālivala-t tirunāḷkkaḷukku Eḻuntaruḷiṉāl mra? A?grahaṇam paṇṇi Aruḷum pōtu svasti śrī colliyum cēvittu-p pōtuṟa Akarattu brāmaṇar palakaṭṭaḷaikaḷilum palarpakkal dāṉam ākavum vilaiyākavum koṇṭu Aṉupavikkiṟa *symbol for land+ 9 + symbol for arai*
